snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s foundation has joined the fight against obesity in Mexico, where President Enrique Peña Nieto wants to tax sugary drinks.
abstract: Mexican Pres Enrique Pena Nieto has proposed tax on sales of sugary drinks as means of reducing nation's increasing rates of obesity and diabetes; New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's foundation Bloomberg Philanthropies is helping to finance drive to curb consumption of drinks in Mexico, effort similar to that pursued by Bloomberg in New York.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s foundation has joined the fight against obesity in Mexico, where President Enrique Peña Nieto wants to tax sugary drinks.

headline.main: Mexico Takes Bloomberg-Like Swing at Soaring Obesity
headline.print_headline: Mexico Takes Bloomberg-Like Swing at Soaring Obesity
